Html:
Hey,

 

I've started on a AR project on school, and I thought I could use this program to learn a thing or two, but I can´t get it to work.

I´ve followed the instructions to download the XNA game studio, installed it, added the newton dll, but whenever I try to open one of the tutorials, all I get is either a random piece of code, or I do get a menu, which doesnt do anything.

 

Any help on how to get this program working would be appreciated.
